title: COAS condoles former Naval Chief Admiral Fasih Bokhari’s demise
content:
RAWALPINDI, Nov 24 (APP): Chief of Army Staff (COAS) General Qamar Javed Bajwa on Tuesday expressed heartfelt condolences on the sad demise of former Chief of the Naval Staff Admiral (R) Fasih Bokhari.
In a tweet, Director General Inter Services Public Relations (DG ISPR) Major General Babar Iftikhar quoted COAS as:
“May Allah bless his soul and give strength to the bereaved family to bear this irreparable loss, Ameen.”
